org.apache.ignite.ml.svm

Class SVMLinearMultiClassClassificationTrainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.DatasetTrainer<M,Double>
      • org.apache.ignite.ml.trainers.SingleLabelDatasetTrainer<SVMLinearMultiClassClassificationModel>
        • org.apache.ignite.ml.svm.SVMLinearMultiClassClassificationTrainer

  • public class SVMLinearMultiClassClassificationTrainer
extends SingleLabelDatasetTrainer<SVMLinearMultiClassClassificationModel>
    Base class for a soft-margin SVM linear multiclass-classification trainer based on the communication-efficient distributed dual coordinate ascent algorithm (CoCoA) with hinge-loss function. All common parameters are shared with bunch of binary classification trainers.

    • Nested Class Summary
